title: suspension due to security reasons should change
body:
/please vote yes to make this topic be heard/
hi i would like to point out in riots security system flaw and change that needs to be implemented
riot should not suspend permanently any user who has suspicious activity ,they should at least lock the accounts for a maximum of  2 or 3 years some players cant even remember the stuff like account creation date original email used when the account was created 10 years ago let alone the first 5 champs. Many players have lost their old accounts simply because riot decided to lock account due to suspicious activity and will not unlock unless verified as owner 
let me clarify  on the questions and their flaws
The Basic
- Account Username (what you log-in with):
- Account Summoner name (your in game name):
- Platform you play on (NA, EU West, EU Nordic & East, OCE): 
- Your current email that you use now:
- Any other email addresses that could have been used on the account:
- Do you still have access to these email addresses?
- Who made this account?
- Any other people (including family members/friends) that have ever had access to the account:

A bit harder
- What was the month and year that the account was created in?
- Location where the account was registered (City, Country):
- Name any refunded champions or skins:
- If you have received or sent gifts, please tell me what it was and who sent it or received it:
- When was the last time that you had access to the account (Month/Day/Year):

ok first of all some people create multiple email and decide to change email 
this is true if you played games in your teen years of 12 to 15
you probably just didn't even care about the email
so how can those people remember the email
the only thing those people can tell are username summoner name and the email it is verified to
,refunded skins or champs and location
lets face it some people just don't spend money in free games thus they wont have any bank details in account
and i doubt people would use  their real date of birth
while  going  to watch porn would you rather watch it by clicking im over 18+ button than OR rather not watch at all because you wont get access if you type your real age

i hope any rioter reading this reads this message and decides to change the system for security 
and suspension and resolve for those players who got banned due to suspicious activity simply because of their ip
im not saying if you think there is suspicious activity that you should not lock accounts im just saying they should not be locked permanently
at least lock them for a time period of 1 o 2 years
Please vote yes to make this topic be heard

replies.body:
> - If you have received or sent gifts, please tell me what it was and who sent it or received it:

Imagine sending a gift to someone 5 years ago, not having them on your list any longer, and even if you remembered who it was add a name change or two to the equation and that question is completely invalidated.

First of all, Riot can see the original gift along with any name changes.

Second, you don't have to answer everything. Hell, you don't even have to answer a majority.

I am not talking about recovery 
I'm talking about account getting locked due to suspicious activity 
I hope one day this happens to you 
Then you shall see answering minority won't do you any good

That is still account recovery. They are the same process. The process is not any different.

And in fact, I have had an account locked for suspicious activity before (I think this is because I was traveling and I logged in before leaving, logged in at the first airport of my layover, then logged in at my destination), and I got it back very quickly even though I remembered next to nothing (it was a smurf, not my main).

Which all questions did you answer correctly
I'm curious I've answered 
Summoner name 
Account name 
Ip 
My location 
Country
Email it's verifed to
Still want more info 
I've even told them what is in my inventory amount of be I have 
Number of champions I have unlocked

Rito should add two-factor and make that the condition for unlocking your account. They can tell if someone is playing from weird IPs. If your account gets "compromised" in spite of 2FA, the lie is obvious and they can uphold the ban.

This I will agree with 
But they still don't do that
And I hate the way they operate 
13000 be or 950 to to change name 
(Paying money to change name)
buying rune pages 
I get the pay for skins 
But seriously chromas just a recolour which even I can do texture modification
And especially server change 
Paying to server change this is next level bs 
They just care about milking $$$
And think about it their TOS States that they can take account back whenever they want
Which basically means they want to lock people out of their accounts so they can buy stuff all over again 
TOS of fortnight ,overwatch ,world of warcraft hell even DotA are nothing compared to this
I can tell you one thing I've learner from league of legends 
1 Always read terms of service for any game
2 if you don't like it don't spend money on it

I have made a new lol account and I'm recording all info 
But I'm pretty sure one day soon they will have a reason to lock it
So I won't spend any money not even a single dime
Lol has been a good learning experience
